headline: Where Will Constellation Brands Stock Be in 3 Years?
summary: This fallen blue chip stock still faces formidable long-term challenges.

headline: Constellation Brands’ Premium Pivot and Buybacks Might Change The Case For Investing In Constellation Brands (STZ)
summary: In the past year, Constellation Brands has faced weaker consumer demand, rising tariffs and falling sales of key beer brands, prompting it to sell lower-end wine and spirits labels and refocus on premium offerings funded by asset sales, debt reduction and reinvestment in its core beer portfolio. An interesting twist is that, despite these operational headwinds and concerns about high debt and low growth, some large investors have added to their positions, pointing to a lower forward...
